===Proper noun===

# [[w:Zhaoyang District|Zhaoyang District]] ([[w:Yunnan Province|Yunnan Province]])
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} Zhaoyang Palace (the [[residence]] of [[w:Empress Zhao Feiyan|Empress Zhao Feiyan]] and [[her]] [[sister]]s)

===Usage notes===
In traditional poetry and drama, Zhaoyang Palace has been used as a metaphor for the residence of a pampered empress or favorite concubine.
